trans-unit.source: Represents a member of a SharePoint project.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SharePoint 项目的成员。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that all child items of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectMember" /> are collapsed in **Solution Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 确保已在解决方案资源管理器中折叠此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectMember" /> 的所有子项。

trans-unit.source: This method iterates through all child items of this <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectMember> instance in **Solution Explorer** and sets their <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectMember.IsExpanded%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法循环访问此的所有子项<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectMember>实例中**解决方案资源管理器**并设置其<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectMember.IsExpanded%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method does not change value of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectMember.IsExpanded%2A> property for this <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectMember> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会更改的值<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectMember.IsExpanded%2A>此属性<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectMember>实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the full source path of the project member file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 获取项目成员文件或目录的完整源路径。
表示一个路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the icon for the project member node displayed in **Solution Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 获取解决方案资源管理器中显示的项目成员节点的图标。

trans-unit.source: An Image object representing an icon.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个图标的图像对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether that node is expanded in **Solution Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否在解决方案资源管理器中展开该节点。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value representing whether the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，表示是否已展开节点。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the project member node displayed in **Solution Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 获取解决方案资源管理器中显示的项目成员节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name of the project node.
trans-unit.target: 表示项目节点的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: the `Name` property returns the feature folder name, not the feature file name.
trans-unit.target: `Name`属性返回的功能文件夹名称，而不是功能文件名称。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the feature file name, call <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectFeature.FeatureFile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的功能文件名称，请调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectFeature.FeatureFile%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the name of the project member node is changed.
trans-unit.target: 在更改项目成员节点名称时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the containing project.
trans-unit.target: 获取对包含项目的引用。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the containing project.
